title: No reproduce Netflix en última versión Firefox
content:
No puedo reproducir contenido en Netflix, me aparece el código de error F7121-3078 indicando que mi navegador no es compatible y que lo actualice a su última versión. El navegador está actualizado correctamente a la versión 92.0.1 64bit y no hay más actualizaciones pendientes.

He probado a actualizarlo manualmente, limpiar cookies y datos, ejecutar como administrador, reinstalar y sigo sin poder utilizarlo
creator: canovga

title: Internal Server Error - Read The server encountered an internal error or misconfiguration and was unable to complete your request.  Reference #3.75b77568.1633169912.1a9a0bb7
content:
I am getting this error when I try to logon one to one particular site for banking I have cleared cache, cookies etc, tried directly typing site url in ie not using a bookmark , I am on Windows 10 PC Firefox 92.0.1 (64 bit). Their site is working on mobile and in other browsers.

What do es this error mean and what else can I do to try to clear it?
creator: jesjaspers

title: mouse clicks registering erratically in 92
content: From 20% to 50% of the time, I need to click more than once on the bookmarks toolbar for Firefox to respond to the click and open the bookmark. Sometimes, I have to click 3 or 4 times for the bookmark to open. It is not dependant on which bookmark I'm choosing. When I click on the bookmark (and it doesn't open), it either shows no indication, or sometimes "winks" in brightness. This is the only situation in Firefox where mouse clicks don't function properly every time. That is, clicking in the address bar or search window always places a text cursor therein; clicking on an existing tab always selects that tab and brings it to front; clicking on a menu bar item always works; etc.
creator: fridaymanyfeathers

title: ČEŠTINA
content: Problém je,že nejnovější Firefox 92.0.1 64bit není kompletně v češtině.Pod pravým tlačítkem nabídka je angličtina. Předem děkuji

title: Firefox now says "Problem loading page"
content: Firefox used to work perfectly, but now every single website I visit shows this message: "The page isn’t redirecting properly; An error occurred during a connection to (website). This problem can sometimes be caused by disabling or refusing to accept cookies." Please help me.

title: Autofill
content:
Hi,

My has no function for saving credit cards. Searching this topic, i found that I need to go to settings, but my settings are not matching the description of what I have to do.

My mozilla rarely autofill adresses, names, etc., and if so i need to high light every box.

Can you please help or do I need to go back to chrome?

title: Annoying updates
content:
Hi there,

the update in the firefox is annoying. I must have a provision to turn OFF updates. Most of the time, the firefox is updating updating updating. It irritates me. I am fed up with this an hence writing this to you. fix it or i will uninstall this nasty browser.
creator: spradabane2000

title: No screenshot capability - unable to display tools on the toolbar
content: Thanks Cor-el for replying with advice on how to use about:config to ensure the screencapture was toggled correctly. It wasn't and I corrected that. Now I have the icon in the toolbar and on the right click menu but when I attempt to use them all I get is a popup menu with a large black X in it and nothing can be done with it. Also, on the toolbar items that are added to it all appear in the overflow and there is no way of getting them to appear on the screen by reducing the size of the search bar. I've been using firefox ever since it first appeared and I've never had problems like this before.
creator: zzzallan

title: How do I turn off or get rid of "Recently bookmarked" that are being displayed in my 3 line -> Library -> Bookmarks menu? I don't want them to be displayed.
content:
I cannot find any way to disable, hide, or remove the Recently Bookmarked list from the bookmark section. These make this window unusable other than the bookmarks that are listed there. I have no use for Recently Bookmarked items to be listed anywhere. I have attempted all of "solutions" that pop up about fixing this issue, but none actually work.

There is no "Hide Recently Bookmarked" when you right click anything on that menu or others involving bookmarks. Similarly, there is no setting regarding it when you search in about:config as is claimed most of the time. Adding a bunch of meaningless bookmarks & deleting them, also does not clear the list as it seems to remember all the bookmarks.

I've found people complaining about this as far back as 49, and as recently as 66 and 78.
creator: son4mother

title: Adding add-on login credentials to exceptions
content:
Hi,

I have a few add-ons installed on Firefox which require to be logged in. I have my Firefox settings to clear history every time I close the Firefox.

My question is... Is there a way that I can retain the logins for the add-ons even after closing the browser?

Currently, every time I launch the browser I have to login.

I have added the homepage URL to exceptions but am not sure that this would help. Kindly help me whit this.

Thank you Suneel

title: Bizarre sound issue
content:
When I switch from external speakers to Headset, Firefox (YouTube) continues to play on the external speakers (but not on the headset). Firefox remains present on the volume mixer for the EXTERNAL speakers, but does NOT appear on the volume mixer for the headphones.

YouTube on Chrome is working properly.

I have updated my drivers, I have "refreshed" Firefox.

Basically when toggling back and forth between my external speakers (Realtek(R) Audio default Device and Headset Earphone: CORSAIR VOID PRO Wireless Gaming Headset Default Multimedia Device) Firefox is always playing on external speakers regardless.
creator: anklebaub

title: Garbled text in emails going out
content: I have a new doctor with a portal I've not used before. When I send a message, it gets garbled. Example: "Iâ™m glad I pursued an elaboration of this report. It was mildly comforting as it says âœhas low malignant probability but does require follow-up." I donâ™t see a way to do an attachment so Iâ™ll cut and paste." The part I cut and pasted was fine. I am on Firefox 92.0.1 and a Mac Laptop. The previous version of Firefox did this too. In this message, it appears not to like apostrophes or quotation marks specifically. My doctor doesn't appreciate trying to decipher them and I am not happy that he can't read them without a problem since we are talking about a potentially serious problem causing me a lot of anxiety. What is the solution? And when will Firefox fix it so I don't have to each time? Thanks!
creator: barbarahunt
